title: San Juan National Historic Site: Traffic & Travel Tips
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Traffic & Travel Tips              Traffic & Travel Tips      Since Old San Juan covers only three square miles and parking is limited, walking can be the best way to get around.  Castillo San Cristóbal has a small parking area with a cost of $2.00 per hour with the first hour been free. This parking is located from Luis Munoz Rivera Avenue, the first right after you pass the Capitol building. Castillo San Felipe del Morro does not have parking facilities and is a one mile walk from Castillo San Cristóbal. For more see directions...
